page.title: 17CHRISTMAS DAY,ROXWELL
page.content: Christmas Day 25th December is used to celebrate Christ's birth. Lots more people go to church than usual to celebrate and they give presents to each other. One Christmas Day I woke up and found my stocking full up with lots of goodies. I had a tangerine, a pocket game and several other things I told mum what I had got and went to see what my Brothers Mark and Patrick had got. I asked Dad whether I could open my presents. He said that I could after dinner. So we went to church. When we came home from church we had dinner. During dinner we watched Jack Tatty. After dinner we opened our presents.My favourite present was a clock radio and a game called Downfall At 9pm we watched Raiders of the Lost Ark on television and after that we watched a comedy called{Some{like it {Hot!}
